Method Detail

writeFileContents

java.lang.Object writeFileContents(java.lang.Object filePath, java.lang.Object fileContents)
Replaces the content between the Start pointer and End pointer in the file with the contents provided
Parameters:
filePath - The String that denotes the location of the file
fileContents - The contents that replaces the existing content in the file
